name: part_012
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・昼公演】SorAZ Major Debut Live『First Gravity』【 #SorAZGravity 】 [9eibYGNOz30]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Promotional slide show featuring announcements for Tokino Sora, SorAZ, and AZKi, followed by project contributor credits.
Live concert footage of the audience clapping and cheering in anticipation of the next performance.
Animated interstellar-themed intro sequence leading into the next section of the live show.
